duties_responsibilities.duty: Participate in a 10-12 week Operations summer internship program at the processing plant, gaining exposure to various projects and assignments.
Develop technical skills and acquire hands-on experience through professional development training.
Build associations with associate peers and interact with senior leadership to understand the Butterball Way.
Demonstrate initiative, leadership, and teamwork to successfully complete assigned tasks.
Possess a valid driver's license and reliable transportation to and from work.

education_certification.credential: Undergraduate pursuing degree in Agri-Business, Animal Science, Food Science, Meat Science, Ag Leadership, Business, Supply Chain, or related field
